history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + qsimpl use: nat_meet_right. qsimpl use: nat_meet_right. srun best use: nat_join_left, binary_le_trans. + qsimpl use: nat_meet_left,nat_meet_right. qsimpl use: nat_meet_left,nat_meet_right. srun best use: nat_join_right, binary_le_trans. - intros [H1 H2]. qsimpl use: nat_meet_left,nat_meet_right. qsimpl use: nat_meet_left,nat_meet_right. qsimpl use: nat_meet_left,nat_meet_right. hauto use: nat_join_idem, nat_join_mono, nat_join_comm.

original: intros k m n. split. - intros H. split. + rewrite -> nat_meet_right. apply H. + rewrite -> nat_meet_left. apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. rewrite -> nat_meet_right in H1. rewrite -> nat_meet_left in H2. apply H1.
